snippet: Government forces and their allies in the Lebanese Shiite group began an offensive in Zabadani, a mountain town.
abstract: Syrian government forces and Hezbollah allies begin offensive against insurgents in town of Zabadani on Lebanese border; campaign is part of effort to control border area.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and HWAIDA SAAD

lead_paragraph: Government forces and their allies in the Lebanese Shiite group began an offensive in Zabadani, a mountain town.

headline.main: Syria Forces and Hezbollah Attack Insurgents Near Lebanon
headline.print_headline: Syrian Forces Attack Rebels Near Lebanon
